listing.listing_description: Capturing breathtaking views of Guana Bay Point, this luxurious six bedroom is the perfect destination for a sunny Caribbean getaway in beautiful St. Martin. Villa Amalia is located minutes from duty-free shopping, vibrant nightlife, and pristine beachfront on Guana Bay Beach. And, it’s just twelve kilometers from St. Martin’s bustling capital, Marigot.Drawing influence from its colonial heritage, Villa Amalia displays traditional Spanish revivalist design. Similar to the mansions of Beverly Hills, this villa is all about luxury, and the appreciation of its beautiful natural surroundings. Soothing white walls, rounded archways, and a red-clay roof provide the perfect contrast to the vibrant blues and greens of the Caribbean. With openings to outdoor spaces in nearly every room, you’ll have no trouble filling Amalia with the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. Inside, you’ll appreciate the elegant marble flooring, peaked wood ceilings, and high-end furniture and electronics. Spacious living rooms and smaller sitting areas make it easy for guests to gather as a group or break-away for more intimate moments. And, no matter where you decide to spend your time, the amazing ocean view is right there with you.Villa Amalia’s six bedrooms all feature en-suite bathrooms, king or queen-sized beds, and all but one have scenic ocean views. At dinner, there’s formal and alfresco dining, and indoor and outdoor sound systems to set the perfect tone. After dinner, stay inside and enjoy the pool table, dart board, ping pong table, exercise room, and spa, or you could venture to the terrace for a swim in the saltwater infinity pool. During your stay, you’ll have the assistance of daily housekeeping, chef services, and a pool keeper.The nearest town to Villa Amalia is Philipsburg, the capital of the island’s Dutch side. There, you’ll find a beautiful boardwalk lined with beachfront bars, duty-free shopping, and Casino Rouge et Noir. After Philipsburg, head north to St. Martin’s French side and check out their capital, Marigot, where you’ll find the Marigot Market, a wide range of dining establishments, water sports activities, and more.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Look out at ocean, golf course, mountain and sunset views at Wai’ula’ula Estate. Part of the exclusive Uplands community at the Mauna Kea Resort, this luxury Big Island vacation rental is poised between gently sloping mountains on one side and lush fairways stretching toward the Pacific on the other. The beautiful setting, convenient location and three suite-style bedrooms mean you can use the villa for a golf getaway with friends, a family holiday on the Kohala Coast or a second honeymoon with your sweetheart.You’ll approach the villa through the gates of the Hapuna Beach Prince Hotel and enter the house via a pergola-covered doorway in a stone wall. Step through the house and onto the private lanai to discover shaded outdoor sitting and dining areas, a sunny terrace lined with loungers and an infinity pool and hot tub facing the ocean. An outdoor kitchen with a wet bar and barbecue makes light work of meal prep. Guests of the villa also enjoy access to the shared infinity pool and fitness center at the Wai’ula’ula Amenity Center.Thanks to a fold-away glass wall, the interiors of Wai'ula’ula Estate 411 feel like an extension of the outdoor spaces. Warm breezes flow through the open-plan great room, which has the same stone tile floors as the lanai and raised ceilings paneled with natural-fiber woven screens. Bamboo accent chairs, palm-print rugs and pillows and wingback-inspired dining chairs in cream, taupe and leafy green hues nod to Hawaii’s traditional style while keeping the look fresh and modern. The fully equipped kitchen continues the vibe with matching stone countertops and backsplash and state-of-the-art stainless steel appliances.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and opens to a terrace. The master suite has a king bed, ocean views and an indulgent al-fresco shower; a second bedroom also has a king bed and ocean views. The third bedroom has two twin beds and looks at the “mauka,” or inland, side, toward the slopes of the mountains.Begin your stay with a flight to Kona International Airport, a 35-minute drive from the villa. Once you’ve come across the ocean to the Mauna Kea Resort, it’s only a 10-minute walk to the Wai’ula’ula Amenity Center and a 5-minute drive to Mauna Kea Beach, Hapuna Beach, the Hapuna Golf clubhouse and the Mauna Kea Golf Course and Resort. Visitors who make the 30-minute drive to Kua Bay Beach will be rewarded by soft white sand and clear water that’s great for snorkeling. Don’t leave the Big Island without at least a glance at the Mauna Kea summit trail, 60 miles away, or the often-active lava flows at Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, 100 miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kahurangi is a beautiful four-bedroom villa overlooking Lake Wakatiup and the Remarkables mountain range on the South Island of New Zealand. Its name combines the Maori words for "sky" (kahu) and "white feather cloak" (rangi), referring to the gentle white clouds that drape the mountain peaks visible throughout the home. The exquisite design blends the shape and ambiance of a vintage Scandinavian-style chalet with a fresh, contemporary feel and high-end amenities; while the prime location places you within minutes of Queenstown and world-class skiing, hiking, and golf.The centerpiece of the home is its vaulted great room, where a sumptuous lounge faces the expansive lake and soaring peaks, accompanied by a TV and fireplace. A gourmet kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances serves a large breakfast bar and a ten-person table beneath a wonderful antler chandelier. An ample deck extends from the great room, inviting you to alfresco meals in the delicious air, while a heated spa invites you to soothing soaks under the spectacular stars. The interior décor blends quintessential alpine staples like rich wood flooring and cabinetry with stylish pendant lighting. The luminous white finishes of the walls and ceilings accentuate the exquisite natural light.The villa features two suites with king beds and two guestrooms with two twin-size beds each (both convertible into king beds). Each of the king suites features an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, while the twin bedrooms share a large bathroom. The twin bedrooms open to the terrace, and all four rooms enjoy spectacular lake and mountain views.The villa offers a prime balance of secluded privacy and convenient proximity to some of New Zealand's finest destinations for sport, play, and adventure. You're just over a kilometer from the heart of Queenstown, Skycity Casino, and Remarkable Golf Tours, and an easy drive to Queenstown Golf Course and the slopes of Coronet Peak Ski Area. Less than seven kilometers from Queenstown Airport, the villa is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or hassle-free escapes with family or friends.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Chianti Fornace is an exquisite country villa in the Chianti region of central Tuscany. Situated in a secluded, rustic setting just five minutes from Tavarnelle Val di Pesa, the villa features beautiful, panoramic views of the surrounding hills and villages, extraordinary indoor and outdoor living and dining areas, and a deluxe private spa. With six superb bedrooms, this vacation rental is ideal for family reunions and momentous occasions in the heart of Tuscan wine country.The gorgeously landscaped estate welcomes you with an enchanting pathway flanked by cypress trees, while lovely lemon and olive trees populate the gardens. Down a flight of stone steps from the villa's back entrance, the swimming pool terrace features elegant loungers and parasols on a smooth stone deck overlooking the countryside. Savor a delicious soak in the jetted hot tub and plunge into the pool for a morning swim. Kindle the stone barbeque grill and enjoy an alfresco meal in the dining pavilion, paired with local wine. Linger in the lounge as the children play on the charming swing set in the afternoon light.Arched French doors open from the yard to a lovely living room, with wicker sofas, stone floors, exposed wood ceiling beams, and fireplace. Savor aperitivi by the fire, prepare classic Italian feasts in the stunning kitchen, and join each other around the six-person dining table beneath the gorgeous chandelier. After dinner, repair to the billiard room for a game of pool and a fine digestivo from the deluxe bar. In the morning, refresh your body in the private spa, with sauna, Jacuzzi, and steam bath.The villa features four bedrooms in its main house—three with double size beds, one with two twins—all with walk-in closets and ensuite bathrooms of travertine marble. The guest house has two additional bedrooms—one with double bed, one with two twins—along with its own kitchen, dining area, and bathrooms.Your location offers a supreme balance of seclusion and convenience. You're just five minutes from the enchanting medieval town of Tavarnelle Val di Pesa, while Florence, Radda, Siena, Gaiole, and San Gimignano are all within thirty to forty minutes—allowing for fantastic daytrips before returning to this private paradise.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Le Moulin ("The Mill") is situated directly on St. Jean Beach along the north coast of St. Barts, just minutes from Gustavia. Named for the restored, antique mill on the estate (which now houses the master bedroom suite), the beachfront villa offers a superb blend of vintage Caribbean elegance and high-end modern comfort. Its ample estate includes an outdoor swimming pool, alfresco dining, and generous space for open-air relaxation, while the cool, spacious interiors feature lovely living and dining areas and a gourmet kitchen. Three superb bedroom suites (including the ocean-view moulin with private entrance) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.The villa is nestled amid palm trees against the beach's soft sands, with expansive views of the turquoise bay and sea. Lounge chairs line the long infinity pool, while the spacious, wrap-around veranda features multiple dining tables and sitting areas—inviting you to relish home-cooked meals and sip island cocktails in the enchanting breeze.Several sets of arched French doors open from the main villa to the veranda, inhaling the sea-kissed air into the home. The cavernous living room offers a dreamy, airy ambiance, with high, vaulted ceilings of natural wood, superb modern furnishings and décor, and lovely curtains. The light-filled kitchen features chef-grade appliances and spacious prep areas, with luminous white walls complementing the wood ceilings and sleek surfaces. It opens directly to the ten-person dining table on the back patio.The master suite is set within the old mill, with French doors opening to a furnished terrace and the sandy beach. The room enjoys beautiful ocean views and features a comfortable queen bed and ensuite bathroom. In the main villa, the primary guest suite features a king bed and opens to the terrace, while the second guest suite has a split-king bed (or two twin beds). Both enjoy ensuite bathrooms with dual vanities.Le Moulin balances exquisite seclusion with a highly convenient location within minutes of Gustavia and the international airport. In addition to St. Jean Beach bordering your estate, several of the island's finest beaches are within easy reach. Guided boat tours embark from Gustavia for the sublime Saint Barthelemy Natural Reserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Great golf, great views and great company: it's easy to make it all part of a California holiday at Villa Lago. Set on the edge of the lake in the exclusive community at the PGA West Stadium Course, this Desert Cities vacation rental looks out over the lush fairways to the rugged mountains beyond. Nearly 5,000 square feet of living space and four bedrooms mean you can host up to eight friends on a golf getaway or extended family for a sunny stay.When you're not teeing off, relax in resort-worthy outdoor living areas that feature an infinity pool, hot tub, lounging and dining spaces, a barbecue and even an al-fresco TV. After a day on the golf course, serve drinks from the wet bar and wine cooler, and unwind by the Sonos sound system, cable TV and Wi-Fi.Nearly wall-to-wall panels of slide-away glass frame the mountain vistas for your enjoyment from an expansive open-plan great room with sitting and dining areas, a breakfast table and a breakfast bar in a fully equipped kitchen. A stacked-stone fireplace and linen-hued fabrics lend the space a serene, natural ambience, while in the kitchen, stainless steel appliances bring state-of-the-art efficiency.Villa Lago has two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub, gas fireplace and terrace access, and two bedrooms with queen beds. All four bedrooms at this luxury property have private en-suite bathrooms.Though its lakeside setting feels tranquil, when it comes to activities and attractions, the villa is in the heart of the action. It's a 10-minute drive or less from golf at the Stadium Course at PGA West and Motorcoach Country Club, the grounds of the Coachella festival, and shopping and dining at charming Old Town La Quinta. And if you need to fit in a few more rounds, there are several other golf courses within a 25-mile radius.License # 765943Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Live it up in the heart of the metropolis with a stay in this artistic and fashionable penthouse. Nestled amongst towering skyscrapers, take advantage of great access to the entertainment district, before returning in style to huge living spaces, tall columns, sunny roof terrace and a sublime pool. Downtown, LA Live, the Convention Centre, and the Staples Center are just a short walk away.Entering this opulent surrounds of Sky Penthouse, the first thing that strikes guests is the huge 17 foot windows that provide an incredible view of the city streets below. The second aspect will be the sheer luxury and sense of space in the penthouse, with vertical columns increasing the size feel, while fine furniture, spotless kitchen and reclining area all occupy the central section. Relax over breakfast on the shaded and quiet terrace, before moving to the second outdoor area, the sunny pool patio which offers sweet refreshment from the California heat. An impressive outdoor seating area is at your disposal, complete with host-with-the-most barbecue, plus a touch of rustic charm via the outdoor firepit. Explore the complex’s other fine amenities, and make the most of the supplied spa, plus that LA must-have; a fully-equipped exercise center.Guests could not ask for a better location when it comes to staying in LA proper. For business trips, the LA Convention Centre, as well as that commercial hub, LA Live, are less than 10-minute walk away. Plunge into the major cultural institutions, such as the LA County Museum of Art. This highly central location ensures you can visit all the best aspects of this global city via short drive, from the famous beaches and sunny climes of Santa Monica, to the strips and landmarks of Hollywood, Sky Penthouse provides the perfect balance of both location and next-level comfort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From mountain views and lavish outdoor spaces to modern design, Villa Larino has everything you need for a Tuscan vacation in style. Located in the hills just east of Pisa, the four-bedroom villa puts the Tuscan landscape just outside your windows, and the region’s towns and cities within easy driving distance.Take advantage of Villa Larino’s sun-soaked hilltop location in one of its outdoor spaces: a saltwater pool, pool deck filled with chaise longues, shower, grill, wood-burning oven, pergola or dining area. You can even breathe some fresh air into your workout routine at the small covered outdoor gym. Inside, there are video games and an iPod dock for entertainment, Wi-Fi access for convenience and air conditioning for comfort.The villa’s decor juxtaposes traditional elements like brick hearths, beamed ceilings and terracotta floors with modern furnishings—think sleek cream leather sofas and cool Lucite chairs in the living room. The dining room pairs a hefty wooden Parsons-style table with Louis Ghost chairs for an effect that’s both rustic and chic. In the fully equipped modern kitchen, minimalist white cabinets support a graphic black breakfast bar.Each of the property’s four bedrooms has air conditioning, a television and views of both the garden and mountains. Whimsical details like looped metal headboards and filigreed Lucite lamps and nightstands make each room a stylish retreat. All four bedrooms have double beds, and one has an en-suite bathroom as well.Villa Larino is less than a mile from the nearest restaurant, in Alica, and about 4 km from the grocery store in Forcoli. You’ll find a gym in Peccioli, 5 km away, a restaurant in Palaia, about 6 km away, and a tennis club in Pontedera, about 9 km away. The town center and train station of Pontedera are 12 km away, the Castelfalfi golf club is 18 km away and the Pisa airport is just over 33 km away. Hit the slopes at Abetone, 110 km away, or the beach in Tirrenia, 42 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend your ski holiday just above the lift at Hayden Lodge 2202. This corner-unit Snowmass Village vacation rental overlooks the Village Express chairlift, giving you ski-in, ski-out access—and an easy way to see if there’s a lineup. Its three bedrooms are just the right size for a Colorado trip as a family or an Aspen Snowmass getaway with up to six friends.Villa guests are welcome to use the shared outdoor hot tub, ski lockers and children’s center at Hayden Lodge. The villa also has its own furnished private balcony with views of the slopes and chairlift, underground parking spot, television, wine fridge and Wi-Fi.This luxury villa puts a fresh spin on traditional mountain-lodge style, with a great room anchored by a contemporary fireplace rendered in classic wood and stone. Cozy up in the sitting area, gather around the dining table to relive the day’s adventures (or plan the next one) or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen for a coffee or a snack between runs.Hayden Lodge 2202 features a master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and honeymoon-suite-worthy details such as a jetted tub. The other two bedrooms have, respectively, a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and a twin-over-queen bunk bed and shared bathroom.Perhaps the best feature of the villa, however, is its slopeside location just steps from the Village Express lift. Avid skiers will want to make the short drive to Buttermilk Mountain or Aspen Highlands; for après-ski entertainment, it’s also an easy trip to Snowmass Village and downtown Aspen. If you’ll be visiting in warmer weather, both the Snowmass Club Golf Course and the Aspen Golf and Tennis Club are close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover the luxury of true indoor-outdoor living at the unique Villa Zelie. Made up of four pavilions set in a terraced garden, this five-bedroom Canggu vacation rental exudes both traditional chic and modern flair. While it feels like a private retreat, a location close to beaches, shopping and dining puts the best of Bali at your doorstep.Your holiday at Villa Zelie includes the services of a chef, villa manager, housekeeper, gardener and security staff. Spend your stay sampling amenities such as a two-story spa and massage pavilion, an open-air media room with a projector and screen, a bar and Wi-Fi. Or step outside to enjoy the main pool, children’s pool, lounge areas and barbecue.The villa’s teak and ironwood pavilions are inspired by classic Javanese joglo and gladak houses, with their high roofs and open sides, and water features create the illusion that the garden extends inside. But the furnishings, carefully selected by the property’s Parisian owner, an interior designer, exude a more modern style in the comfortable lounge, bar and dining areas. Though chef service is included, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.The five bedrooms at Villa Zelie can accommodate groups of up to ten on a family reunion, tropical getaway with friends or even an intimate destination wedding. Each bedroom has a king bed, air conditioning and a terrace, and opens to a semi-outdoor en-suite bathroom to rival that in any honeymoon suite.The villa’s location between Seminyak and Canggu means you’re only a 2-minute walk from Kayu Putih Beach and the beachfront La Laguna restaurant and bar. It’s also a short walk from Finns Beach Club, right in front of a spectacular surf break, and the water slides, trampolines and more of Finns Recreation Club. Don’t miss sunset at the nearby Tanah Lot Temple or a round or two at the Nirwana Bali golf club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to the wilderness of the Spanish Peaks at this scenic ski lodge in Big Sky, Montana. Gaze upon the imposing views of Lone Peak from the comfort of a plush leather sofa. Let the Fan Mountian range inspire you while rejuvenating in the hot tub. And, warm up by the wood-burning fire after a day on the slopes. Later, drive 7 miles to Big Sky’s town center for a steak dinner at Horn and Cantle.Decorated with towering evergreens, exposed wood, and natural stone, Hoos View encapsulates the rugged essence of Montana. The kitchen’s breakfast bar is the perfect place to sip coffee and plan out an exciting day. When you get home, throw your wet gear in the ski storage room, and make sure to use the boot warmers. Then gather in the great room to tell tales over a hot chocolate or something from the wet bar.On quiet nights in, throw the big game on the satellite, catch a flick with the family, or organize a shuffleboard tournament. In the warmer months, skip the steakhouse and pick up your own cuts from the local butcher for a backyard barbecue. Enjoy your meal amongst the mountain views at the alfresco set. Later, get a fire going in the fire pit and gather around for some smores.With ski access just 5 minutes from home, you’ll be able to carve the slopes of Big Sky bright and early each morning. In the summer, golf in Montana is an incredibly scenic way to take in the landscapes. After your round, stop into the Moonlight Basin Clubhouse for lunch. Then, head into town to try out some craft beers at Lone Peak Taproom or Beehive Basin Brewery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This villa’s name is a tribute to Soliman Bay, a hidden gem and one of the most protected bays along the Mayan Riviera. Villa Soliman is a place where visitors experience true simplicity and refinement, where everything slows down and the wristwatch becomes the sun in the sky once again. Here time reveals itself in the gentle passing of the clouds, the cool sea breeze and the colors of crystalline water. Come immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the gorgeous bay and unique serenity at Villa Soliman.Lounge in the swimming pool or relax next to it in the outdoor lounging area. With stunning ocean views right from your villa, and perfect lounging spots, you can hang out and bask in the sunshine all day long. Varieties of palm trees and tropical plants surrounding the infinity swimming pool create a heavenly environment. Your villa includes a rooftop terrace with hot tub, kayaks, snorkeling equipment, daily housekeeping service and a meet-and-greet.Sitting behind the sand dunes, Villa Soliman harmoniously integrates elements of nature into the design of the house. Inspired by the beauty of Soliman Bay, the interiors of the villa feature minimalist furnishing combined with a playful mix of soothing colors that reflect the laid-back, beachside lifestyle. Two fully equipped kitchens, two interior dining areas and two elegant living rooms create a dual living environment perfect for friends and families to get their space.This villa has six ocean view bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and private terraces facing the ocean. Accommodating up to twelve guests, Villa Soliman is perfect for families, corporate retreats and diverse groups. Relax and unwind on the pristine linens and luxuriously comfortable beds to emerge rejuvenated and refreshed each new morning.Nestled on a sandy beach with palm trees looking out over the crystal blue Caribbean, this truly inviting Mayan Riviera beachfront villa offers a spectacular experience. Activities on Soliman Bay include swimming, snorkeling, kayaking and diving, all accessible from the white sand beach. Enjoy the stunning natural beauty of Mexico and relax in your home away from home at Villa Soliman!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: A hand-painted sign hangs over a table on Villa Saline Reef’s immense terrace that reads, “Relax! It doesn’t get much better than this!” Truer words have never been written: luxury, quiet seclusion, tasteful design and spectacular views guarantee this epithet. Located at the northernmost tip of Saline Point in the exclusive Cap Estate, prepare for an escape that will stay with you forever.Bright bougainvillea and lush green tropical flora pepper a large tiled terrace where you’ll find chaises in both sunny and shady spots. Wherever you choose to relax, the gorgeous split-level pool, with waterfall feature, will eventually beckon you. Swim in the lower half or sit in the upper half and enjoy views of Pigeon Island and across the Caribbean straights to Martinique. The dining and grill deck provides an uninterrupted sunset view to enjoy while savoring an al fresco feast.Saline Reef is decorated throughout with soft and handmade furnishings imported from England. The central living room is bright and airy, courtesy of wide French doors, large bay windows and fans hanging from the high, vaulted ceiling. Upstair, a professionally-appointed kitchen gives you everything you need to prepare a memorable meal for your guests. Enjoy it from the elegant dining table that seats 6.The villa sleeps 6 people in 3 bedrooms, including 2 Master bedrooms, one above the other. Each Master bedroom has a private deck, including a romantic crow’s nest seating area for 2, overlooking the sea. All rooms contain a Queen size bed, walk-in closet, fine linens and bathrobes, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.Saline Reef is only 3.8 km from the Rodney Bay area, the hub of St. Lucia’s cultural life. In the town of Gros Islet you’ll find upscale shopping, fine dining and a bustling marina where you can rent sailboats. You’re walking distance from an 18-hole golf course and several beaches ideal for swimming or snorkeling. Boat trips can be arranged to the famous Pitons and Sulphur Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

listing.listing_description: New bookings may be eligible for a special package which can include one or more of the following amenities and services: free or discounted rounds of golf and/or massages, pre-arrival butler service, preferred 24hr in advance restaurant reservations, and preferred 72hr in advance tee time reservations. Availability and other conditions may apply. Please inquire with one of our Villa Specialists for more details!This luminous loft apartment is located within the Grand Luxxe Residential Club at Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta, a world-class beachfront resort on Mexico's Riviera Nayarit. Rooftop swimming pools and a spa are among the Grand Luxxe's exclusive offerings, while the resort features a seemingly limitless array of activities and amenities, including championship golf, a waterpark, and over 40 restaurants and nightlife lounges. Within this spectacular setting, the villa offers a serene sanctuary for private time with family or friends. The voluminous interior features a TV lounge, dining table, and chef-grade kitchen, opening to a generous balcony terrace with an alfresco living/dining area and private plunge pool perched outside the master bedroom. An expansive glass wall infuses the home with natural daylight and refreshing air, framing the lush landscape where the Ameca River flows into the Bay of Banderas. The lofted upper story includes a second TV lounge and the guest bedroom, which is essentially a second master. The villa is wheelchair-accessible and features Wi-Fi and air conditioning throughout.Part of a constellation of hotels within Vidanta Nuevo Vallarta, the Grand Luxxe is the only one with a 5 Diamond rating from AAA. Its 9 towers feature an array of pools and hot tubs, including a rooftop oasis with restaurant and Pacific Ocean views. Spatium Spa is open exclusively to Grand Luxxe guests, while your vacation rental also includes access to state-of-the-art fitness facilities and the fabulous waterpark nearby.Golf lovers will find themselves in paradise at Vidanta, with 2 championship courses, a par-3 course, and Jack Nicklaus Golf Academy. Unique shopping and culinary experiences beckon in all directions, from fine dining to authentic local goods to a gourmet market. And, of course, you're just 10 kilometers from Puerto Vallarta and a short boat ride from the Marieta Islands.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This extraordinary estate style villa enchants the moment you enter the gate. The long, palm-lined drive brings you to a large private courtyard and garden. Beyond the front door is a stunning house and one of the most dazzling oceans views on island. Panoramic vistas flow from every room and terrace. The colors are magical. An expansive stretch of sapphire sea is framed by the villa’s gardens and the rich blue sky. The large contoured pool edges overlap the lawn adding crystal blue tones to the scene.The house is open, airy and spacious; a perfect villa for an extended family, weddings or company retreat. It has everything you need to enjoy the day from dawn until dusk. The overall décor is sleek, elegant and contemporary but never boring. The large interior living room, perfect for conversation or entertainment, tastefully mixes natural elements and rich tones; dark wood and teak, wicker, cream and pops of color. Pocket doors disappear into the walls enhancing the view. Although sea views and breezes abound, the great room is fully air conditioned.The interior dining room sits adjacent to the unique kitchen area. Divided into two rooms, half the space is devoted to a gorgeous chef’s kitchen with flat screen TV. The other half is a fabulous gathering space with bar and seating. A cozy al fresco dining area sits in the courtyard just off the bar. Deep covered terraces and open sundecks surround the house, the main pool and lap pool. Comfortable lounges and dining spaces abound.The four equal size bedrooms are spacious and comfortable. Two sit on each end of the villa. The décor creates a serene atmosphere blending designer touches and art; neutral tones of beige, brown, black or grey and white with individual pops of rich color. Each room has private seating, sea views and beautiful spa style bathrooms in travertine, stone and wood. Three bathrooms have private outdoor showers; one has a sea view.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. It’s a short drive to Plum Bay Beach and five minutes to the airport. In 10 minutes you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Two levels of outdoor living double the fun at this Scandi-inspired contemporary residence a 5-minute walk from downtown Sunshine Beach. Not only is this newly built home cleverly designed, with a glass-walled great room set upstairs for better views, it’s also smart, with Sonos sound-system integration throughout. Surf or swim at the beach in town, refueling at local cafes and eateries as needed. Find out why this part of Australia is called the Sunshine Coast in outdoor areas with living, lounging, and dining furniture; a gas barbecue; and an al-fresco shower. (There are also shaded areas if you want to nap under cover.) In addition to speakers throughout the house, you’ll find a smart TV and Wi-Fi inside. Honey-colored wood floors, white walls, and clean-lined furniture bring a little Scandinavian chic to the open-concept great room at this vacation rental, whose floor-to-ceiling windows look out over the treetops. There’s a living area, dining area for 10, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar that opens to the al-fresco dining deck. A separate media room on the ground floor opens to the other outdoor living areas and the pool. This luxury property has two bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: one master suite with a king bed, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms share a hall bathroom and have two twin beds and two twin-over-double bunk beds—perfect if you’ve brought the whole family on holiday. 30 Belmore Terrace is a 5-minute walk from downtown Sunshine Beach and a 7-minute walk from Noosa Heads. In Sunshine Beach, swim and surf on the namesake beach, patrolled year-round by lifeguards, before finishing with a drink on the surf-club deck, where you might be able to spot dolphins and whales in the waves. In Noosa Heads, trendy Hastings Street is home to must-try coffee shops along with honeymoon-worthy restaurants. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: European charm comes to Colorado at the gorgeous Cypress Mountain Chalet. Its cozy interiors, luxury amenities and five bedrooms welcome up to fifteen guests in comfort. A location in the exclusive Highlands of Breckenridge area puts you a 10-minute drive or less from skiing, plus shopping and dining in downtown Breckenridge.The chalet features private outdoor living areas with a hot tub, al-fresco dining for eight and a barbecue. Despite its Old World–inspired architecture, it also boasts state-of-the-art entertainment, with a television, Xbox 360, sound system and Wi-Fi. For those who prefer to unwind the traditional way, there’s a gas fireplace in the media room and a wet bar, too.Wood paneling and stone walls make this vacation rental feel like it’s been transplanted from Switzerland, but the spacious open-concept layout is all New World. Settle in with family and friends under the double-height ceiling in the great room, or gather in one of the two dining areas adjoining the fully equipped kitchen: a dining table and a breakfast nook.Cypress Mountain Chalet has one master bedroom with a king bed and jetted tub, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with your choice of two twin beds or a double bed; these three bedrooms all have en-suite bathrooms. The other two bedrooms have a twin bunk bed plus a queen bed, and two twin bunk beds, respectively, and shared bathroom access.While on holiday at this villa, you’ll be just a 10-minute drive from skiing on Peak 8 at Breckenridge, as well as shopping and dining in downtown Breckenridge. Bring the family for a day out on cross-country skis or snowshoes at the Breckenridge Nordic Center, 5 minutes away by car, or plan a honeymoon-worthy dinner in town for a grown-ups’ evening out.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular oceanfront villa in St. Martin is located within Terrasse de Cul de Sac, within minutes of Orient Beach, Anse Beach Club, and Hope Estate. Newly renovated, the villa features a private boat dock and breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea and Pinel Island. Ample alfresco living and dining spaces along with exquisite interiors set the stage for an unforgettable island escape, while six deluxe bedrooms (all with ensuite bathrooms) comfortably accommodate families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.Savor dreamy days in the Caribbean sun, floating in the infinite swimming pool, sipping cool cocktails on elegant loungers or sumptuous sunbeds, and beholding the sublime ocean views. Launch your boat or kayak onto the vast expansive of scintillating sea, and return to a delicious barbeque at the alfresco table. At sunset and at night, linger outdoors in the lanai's ample lounge, relishing the dreamy island breeze.An open wall joins the lanai and the interior living areas, allowing you to savor the ocean's enchanting presence all evening long. Adjacent indoor and alfresco living areas form an expansive, seamless space for entertaining guests. The luminous gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and one of its windows serves as the lanai's bar. Beside the kitchen, a lovely table is perfect for morning coffee or breakfast. The décor is exquisite in both the lanai and the interior, with gallery-worthy artwork and a bright yet cool palette that echoes the spirit of the sea.The villa includes six extraordinary bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms and furnished terrace areas, providing wonderfully placid privates spaces for downtime and rest. Five of the suites feature king beds and one has two twin-size bunk beds. Four of the six bedrooms enjoy ocean views.Mapai balances exquisite seaside privacy with easy access to nearby beaches, dining, and nightlife. The center of Cul de Sac is within walking distance, where you'll find dining options; there is also excellent dining and nightlife at nearby Orient Bay, Grade Case, and Hope Estate, with its renowned Bacchus restaurant. Anse Marcel Beach Club and Orient Beach area also just minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With accommodations for seven in downtown Chelsea, the fashion district, it doesn’t get any easier to explore the many wonders of Central London. Big Ben, Hyde Park, Buckingham Palace, Piccadilly Circus, and so many more world famous attractions are located within twenty-minutes drive. And, when it comes to culture, nightlife, fine dining, and shopping, you won’t have any trouble finding something new and exciting in Chelsea, there’s plenty to see within a short walk from Prince Luxe.This purple pastel townhouse is located just off King’s Road in the middle of an adorable line of houses that showcase Chelsea’s stylish and cheerful way of life. Once inside, you’ll love the modern-elegant ambiance created by a soft color scheme, contemporary furniture, and sleek, high-end electronics, appliances, and fixtures. The kitchen is beautifully designed, with integrated appliances and plenty of functional workspaces.Prince Luxe comes with a fully equipped kitchen and offers two great spaces for dining in. First, the elegant dining room, with a mirrored accent wall and seating for six, it is perfect for formal occasions. The second option is the alfresco set on the rooftop patio; it’s a great spot to drink your morning coffee and plan out another exciting day in London.Enjoying a laidback brunch is a favorite pastime of Chelsea residents, and places like Bluebird, Tom’s Kitchen, and Eelbrook are among the most popular spots. After brunch, you could check out Stamford Bridge, the stadium where Chelsea FC play, you’ll see their fans and colors just about everywhere in Chelsea. Just off Sloane Square, the Saatchi Gallery is an incredible contemporary art museum housed in an old military building from the turn of the eighteenth-century. At dinner, Gordon Ramsay’s three-Michelin starred restaurant is nearby on Royal Hospital Road. And, you’ll want to check out local pubs like Chelsea Potter and McGettigan’s, or popular dance clubs Raffles and JuJu for some late night fun.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Indulge in a tropical holiday in this lavish home, set upon the edge of a ridge along the West Coast—it’s one of our top villas in Barbados. You’ll experience touches of luxury from the moment you step on the grounds. A playground for the rich and famous, Barbados is an ideal gateway for visitors pursuing the sun, fine dining and high-end shopping.Sink into one of the cushioned lounge chairs under a sun umbrella on the back deck; you’ll find several facing the infinity-edge pool. From here, you can walk across a wooden bridge that sits over the pool and leads to a raised gazebo. This back terrace lights up at night, and along with a barbecue, it becomes a perfect spot for evening entertaining.Inside the villa, you’ll find comfortable living spaces with plush furnishings and features like a flatscreen television—the living area also opens up to the terrace allowing tropical breezes to flow through the home. The large kitchen comes fully equipped with modern appliances, although you won’t have to worry about cooking, a chef service is included with your stay. Enjoy meals out on the raised dining area with seating for 10.Alila’s four bedrooms can accommodate up to eight guests, including children, and each bedroom features a private, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. The master suite encompasses the entire upper level and boasts a super king size bed and opulent bathroom along with an alfresco tub on a private patio. The remaining rooms include king, queen and twin beds.You’ll be a quick a five-minute drive to the beach and facilities at Sandy Lane Hotel. Meanwhile, the variety of dining and shopping options in Holetown are just seven minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Open yourself to unexpected moments at La Sorpresa. Contemporary architecture, sea views and the balmy Costa del Sol weather create a relaxed, inviting ambience at this luxury Marbella vacation rental, whose name means “the surprise.” Invite up to eight friends or family to see what serendipity awaits.Set on a peaceful, private hillside amid pine and cork trees, La Sorpresa opens to an expansive terrace overlooking the mountains and sea. Settle into a lounge chair in the sun, swim in the long infinity pool or barbecue local seafood to serve at the al-fresco dining area. Inside, the villa’s features include an exercise area, steam room, games room and wine cellar.The villa’s bright, open-plan interiors incorporate modern luxuries in a stylish way. The rooms are linked by traditional brick archways, the sweeping staircase is adorned with wrought iron, and the living and dining areas open to the terrace through huge sliding glass doors. There’s plenty of space for everyone to gather on the sectional in the living room, the wicker chairs around the dining table and at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.The four bedrooms at La Sorpresa can easily accommodate groups of friends or families on holiday together. There are three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, and two bedrooms with queen beds and private terraces. The fourth bedroom has a king bed, a single bunk bed and shares a hall bathroom.Though the villa feels secluded, it’s only a short drive from some of the best beaches and prettiest towns along the Costa del Sol. Make the 5-minute trip to San Pedro for a relaxed afternoon on golden sand underneath fragrant eucalyptus trees, or the 15-minute drive to Playa Puerto Banus to stroll the boardwalk and play in the warm, shallow water. There’s a golf course just 10 minutes away, and everything from souvenir shops to honeymoon-worthy dining in downtown Marbella, 15 minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Positioned for 360-degree views, you can find the Aegean Sea, Cretan Mountains, and sprawling valleys of Rethymno at this modern villa. Sip your morning tea at the smaller, ocean-facing bistro set while the kids play on the jungle gym. Swim a few laps in the pool to warm up before heading to the Blue Flag awarded, Adelianos Kampos Beach. It’s just a few minutes from home.Orizontes borrows inspiration from the traditional architectural style of the Cyclades, adding a delightfully modern touch. Rounded edges get straightened out. Small circular windows turn into landscape capturing floor-to-ceiling openings. In the living room, a floating staircase opens the space even more. Let the fully-equipped kitchen inspire your creative side and try your hand at a traditional Greek dish. After dinner at the alfresco set, pour yourself another glass of wine and sink into the soothing hot tub.Rethymno is one of the most well-preserved Renaissance cities in Greece, as well as a haven for outdoor enthusiasts. Wander the ancient streets to find incredible architecture, traditional Greek restaurants, and boutique shops. Just outside the city, you’ll find hiking trails, gorges, caves, and even more pristine beachfront. Follow the coast east, and you’ll find the beautiful city of Heraklion, which is known for its famous Archeological Museum.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exquisite Costa Rican villa enjoys a beachfront location at Santa Teresa cove, just steps from the Florblanca hotel and minutes from Playa Hermosa. Nestled amid lush tropical trees and flowers yielding to Pacific ocean vistas, the villa offers ample alfresco living space for dining and relaxation, elegant and spacious interiors with beautiful rustic accents, and three bedroom suites accommodating six guests.The arcaded veranda of white stone overlooks a rich blue swimming pool that leads your gaze toward the Pacific expanse. Enjoy enchanting days in the ocean breeze while sunbathing on elegant loungers and relaxing in the delicious pool. Stroll along your private stretch of beach and plunge into the crystalline water before returning to afternoon barbeques and alfresco meals.Wide sets of doors open between the veranda and the villa's interior, allowing the home to breathe the ocean air. The seamless indoor/outdoor space provides a lovely setting for cocktail parties with guests or serene evenings with loved-ones. Enjoy home cooking in the gourmet kitchen and delectable feasts of local fare at the dining table. Ample glass doors and clerestory windows invite exquisite light into the home, while wood furnishings add a soothing, rustic earthiness to the luminous space.There are two king bedroom suites and one with two twin beds. All three enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and the king suites both have alfresco showers. The master suite features a furnished balcony and garden views, while the primary guest suite has a king bed and lounge area. The twin bedroom has its own kitchenette and opens to a furnished balcony—a great private sanctuary for kids. Serene minimalism with rustic touches provides an exquisite ambiance for siestas and peaceful nights.Perched along the shore where Playa Santa Teresa meets Playa Cocal, Maison Marazul enjoys a fabulous location for relishing the natural beauty and pura vida lifestyle of the Guanacasta province and Costa Rica. Up and down the coastline you'll discover wonderful restaurants, wellness retreats, and beaches with distinct characters. Beside you, Florblanca offers world-class resort amenities just a short walk away, including wellness facilities, yoga, and dining.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near to this villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Slopeside Manor is the definition of mountain luxury and a destination unto its own. This magnificent custom six bedroom, six and a half bath residence was built by one of Breckenridge’s premier luxury homebuilder. As you enter this seven thousand square foot masterpiece, you are warmly greeted by an entry that overlooks the great room. With five king bedrooms, a spacious bunkroom and four outdoor living areas, this captivating estate was designed for special gatherings and pure alpine bliss.Care to enjoy some bowling? You and your guests can do so at One Ski Hill Place. Take a dip in the pool and swim off the stress of the day to day. Slopeslide Manor features endless amenities including a full wet bar, game room and fireplace, as well as pool, ping pong table and shuffleboard tables and gaming tables. The media room is equipped with a nine foot screen, surround sound, ten reclining leather chairs and a wet bar area with extra seating for five. The kids have a space all their own in the large bunk room that features bean bag chairs and a flat screen television with an Xbox. Step outside to relish the outdoor living area with a fire pit and a private hot tub for nine.The gourmet kitchen features a double-stack oven, two dishwashers, built-in refrigerator and a Thermador stove. Fine dining is guaranteed with seating for five at the large curved granite island complimented by a beautiful dining area that seats ten. Let us know, and the staff will pre-stock the villa or set up activities and excursions for you and your guests.With a total of six exquisite bedrooms Slopeside Manor can accommodate up to twenty-two guests. Each bedroom includes king or twin sized bunk beds, an en-suite bathroom with shower and a television. Get the rest and relaxation your body deserves at your very own mountain chalet.Slopeside Manor is only a jaunt from the town of Breckenridge where you can enjoy resplendent galleries, decadent restaurants and a great nightlife. Family reunions or groups of friends, Slopeside Manor will provide anything and everything you need for a memorable alpine holiday! With all sorts of activities including skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, hiking, and many more, Colorado mountain adventures are endless year round!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Resonating in complete harmony with its natural surroundings, Northside is a spacious, welcoming ski home in the exclusive Empire Pass community of Deer Valley. Five bedrooms and seven bathrooms make Northside the perfect vacation home for large groups and families. Add the private hot tub, ski-in/ski out access to the slopes and home theater, and this is shaping up to be your ideal mountain retreat.Spend social evenings in the mountain air, gathering in your private outdoor hot tub for chilled out drinks. Create dream vacation moments and wonderful memories under the starry Utah sky. Inside you have a super games room, complete with retro arcade machine. A games console is accompanied by a terrific big screen and cushy giant beanbags. Or congregate on the gorgeous u-shaped leather couch in Northside’s home theater for a laid-back movie night.The lounge is lovingly scattered with an eclectic mix of comfy armchairs and couches. Light a fire, put on your favorite tunes and gather here after an eventful day on the mountain. Fabulous views over the treetops give this space an even more magical feeling. Spacious and exceedingly well-equipped, the kitchen is an open, social and practical area while the dining area sits on its own polished platform and is prettily lit for a lovely evening meal ambiance. An extra reception room becomes whatever you want it to - a quiet spot to hide away with a book, a study for researching fun activities in Deer Valley or even an exercise room.Mountain views and traditional stone fireplaces make the two sumptuous king size rooms extra special. Enjoy views of the great outdoors, snug under your plush comforter. En-suites with jetted tubs complete the luxury experience. The twin is incredibly cozy, and houses a magnificent antique style wardrobe for all your vacation outfits. Like all the bedrooms, the superb queen also has an en-suite and a television. Charming alpine inspired bunk-beds call the fifth bedroom home, gifting plenty of sleeping space.Northside’s ideal ski-in/ski-out location is helpful in the mornings and absolute bliss at the end of a day on the mountain. Ski or board to your heart’s content on the perfectly groomed runs of Flagstaff Mountain. The Utah Olympic Park is nearby where you can experience the exhilarating thrill of the 2002 Olympic bobsleigh track. Take the dial-a-ride shuttle bus to Park City for shops, restaurants and entertainment.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The approach to Mer Soleil sets the stage for an exotic French Creole villa with Mediterranean flair. Colorful mosaics embedded in whitewash walls hug the teak main gate further flanked by tall palms in oversized planters. Past the gate, the stone paved drive is edged with colorful tropical shrubs and palms. Arches, terracotta roofing, columns and ironwork define the entrance. The view dazzles as you enter the home. The turquoise pool edged by tropical foliage draws your eye to the Caribbean Sea and brilliant blue sky. Within view are the island of Saba, Baie Lounge Beach and the luxury hotel La Samanna. At night, sunsets are simply brilliant.The villa flows seamlessly from the interiors to the covered terraces and onto the spacious pool terrace. The open plan great room mixes Caribbean touches with French style. Arched windows, doors and ironwork add to the exotic attitude. Rattan, teak, painted and tiled furniture accent the local art and interesting accessories. Cream and blue tones connect the seating and dining area. A large Provençal style kitchen, in beautiful wood cabinetry and marble tiles with high-end appliances, is a very elegant place to prepare a meal, whether by a professional or amateur chef. The main kitchen opens to the view and to a gorgeous blue tile Moroccan inspired covered outdoor kitchen and dining gazebo. It is a stunning place to cook and dine al-fresco. The gazebo also houses additional living room seating overlooking the gardens and ocean view.Three bedrooms are in the main villa; two off the upper terrace and one at garden level. Two additional bedrooms are in a private cottage tucked behind the villa. All bedrooms have either sea or garden views plus private seating inside and out. Poster beds, rattan and teak furniture, charming Provence and tropical inspired fabrics in blues, yellows and white create a romantic feel to the rooms. The en-suite bathrooms are gorgeous in traditional Provençal tiles and mosaics, each room in a different color. Several bathrooms have either sea or garden views from their walk-in showers. The cottage bedroom suites each have a wet bar and fridge while also providing an interconnecting door, a great feature for families.You are close to amenities. Wonderful gourmet food and wine stores are just a short drive in Cupecoy. A short 15-minute drive and you are at the International airport or the nightlife of Maho. The French Capital, Marigot, is only 15 minutes from the villa where you can enjoy Duty Free shopping, boutiques, bakeries and the Creole Market.

listing.listing_description: Capture 180-degree ocean views from the prestigious corner of 7th and Strand, on Manhattan Beach. Steps from the sand, this contemporary villa is the dream boardwalk getaway. The sunny south-facing terrace is the perfect place to work on your tan. When you’re ready to explore, follow the boardwalk downtown for shopping and nightlife. Or, hop on a bike and visit Venice, Redondo, or Santa Monica.The Glass Beach House combines nautical decor with industrial design to create a space that feels at one with its natural surroundings while showing off cutting-edge architecture. From inside, the ocean views are endless. Outside, the social terrace feels at one with the vibrant “walk-streets” in the Manhattan Beach community. The formal dining area quickly becomes alfresco by sliding the ocean-facing door open. After dinner, the kids will love playing in the children’s loft, while you sip wine as the sun sets.If you get lucky, you may spot dolphins, seals, and even grey whales from the beachside terrace. For a closer look, grab a surfboard or stand-up paddleboard from the backyard and hit the ocean. After a morning on the beach, head into LA to do some shopping on Rodeo Drive, or have lunch at The Grove. At night, find a casual pub in Venice or head to one of the legendary clubs on Hollywood’s Sunset Strip.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb beachfront villa is situated on the island of Lembongan, southeast of Bali, with spectacular, panoramic views of the Badung Straights and Devil’s Tear. The Bali-based Italian architect Valentina Audrito designed the home, balancing ancient Balinese influences with contemporary lines and high-end luxury amenities for cooking, dining, and relaxation. Consisting of a four-bedroom main house and a secluded, stand-alone master bedroom pavilion, the villa is ideal for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eleven in size. Your vacation rental includes talented chef services, a butler, housekeeping, and security.The waterfront terrace is ideal for festive gatherings or serene relaxation under the open sky. A beautiful swimming pool with ample tanning shelf stretches from the villa toward the sea, flanked by lovely bean-cushion loungers. A fabulous wet bar with canopy serves the plentiful sitting areas, while a fire pit warms the seaside lounge—an ideal theater for admiring the stars.The breezy living room forms an exquisite space for quiet afternoons or nighttime festivities, with high ceilings, ample windows, beautiful bamboo blinds, and exquisite teak wood surfaces. A cool veranda with polished pebble floors extends from the interior, featuring a dining table for ten, while the elevated platform features a superb, triangular wet bar. Air conditioning ensures a comfortable ambiance throughout the villa.A stepping stone path leads through the garden to the master pavilion. An enchanting private getaway for a couple, this suite features a king bed, private balcony, lounge area, TV, and superb ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, freestanding tub, and shower. In the main house, all four bedrooms feature king beds and open to the terrace, and the two primary guest suites enjoy ocean views. There is a kid-friendly room with three twin beds, and a converted media room with additional bedding. All of the rooms have well-appointed ensuite bathrooms.The villa is a short walk from Sandy Bay Beach Club (an excellent choice for cocktails) and Dream Beach, while the swimmer-friendly Mushroom Bay Beach is about a mile away. Harumaya Day Spa and the fine dining at Cliff Park Lembongan are also within minutes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The namesake slope rises above the terrace at this traditional-on-the-outside, contemporary-on-the-inside Beverly Hills retreat. Its palm-lined drive and red-tiled roof speak to classic California style, while a massive stone fireplace makes a statement in the great room. While a cul-de-sac setting makes for a quiet stay, it’s less than 10 miles to Rodeo Drive, Universal Studios, and more. Mature landscaping makes the sunny terrace and curving pool feel like a private hideaway. There’s also a barbecue and a shaded al-fresco dining area for serving whatever you’ve grilled up. Finish the evening with a soak in the outdoor hot tub, a drink from the indoor wet bar, a favorite show on the smart TV, or a scroll through all your feeds via Wi-Fi. The mass of the double-sided stone fireplace echoes that of the mountain, bringing the landscape indoors to separate the two living rooms. A round dining table has seating for eight friends or family members, and there’s also a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen along with stainless steel appliances. This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and honeymoon-suite-worthy details such as a jetted tub and its own lounge area. There are also three bedrooms with queen beds: two that share a bathroom, and one that shares access to a hall bathroom. While the villa feels tucked away, a holiday at this vacation rental puts you within easy reach of some of L.A.’s most iconic attractions, whether the boutiques of Rodeo Drive or the world-class collection of the Getty Center. Catch a concert at the Hollywood Bowl or, if you’re traveling with the kids, treat them to a day at Universal Studios. With three beaches within 25 miles, you can take a day trip to play in the sand or try out surfing. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hatari Lodge is a custom luxury home located in the coveted Shock Hill neighborhood of Breckenridge. This outstanding Colorado chalet offers contemporary elegance alongside rustic mountain style. Perfect for a ski holiday or a summer retreat into nature, Hatari Lodge is also just a few minutes from the shopping, nightlife and restaurants of downtown Breckenridge.Whether you want to have a barbeque or just relax and stargaze, Hatari Lodge has got you covered outdoors. Later on in the day, while the adults convivially enjoy some après-ski banter, the children can head upstairs to relax in the tiered theater seats to watch a movie or play video games in the impressive media room. At the end of the night, everyone will want to gather on the patio around the fire pit for smores or a soak in the hot tub while taking in the breathtaking views. This stunning vacation rental also features a red felt billiard table and a wet bar – perfect for the consummate entertainer in your entourage!Walnut floors are complemented by vaulted ceilings constructed with massive timber beams and trusses throughout the main floor of this incredible private property with panoramic views in every direction. The main level boasts a spacious entertaining area and a gourmet kitchen that features top-of-the-line appliances, granite countertops, three sinks, a butler’s pantry and a breakfast bar. The adjacent formal dining area opens to a balcony.Five stunning bedrooms decked out in quintessential lodge decor accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms and televisions. You will find king beds in four suites and two twin bunk beds in the fifth. Both master suites offer rain showers and dual vanities. You will also find a jetted tub, walk-in closet and fireplace in one of the master bedrooms.The Shock Hill neighborhood is just a three minute walk to the Gondola Mid Station. From here, guests of Hatari Lodge can take a short ride to the lifts at Peaks 7 and 8 or continue riding it all the way to town. Nordic skiers will be pleased to know that cross-country skiing trails abound in this fabulous location. The Breckenridge Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Get the alpine holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: At the end of a private beach road, located in the exclusive community of the Terres Basses, is Le Mas des Sables, an oceanfront luxury villa with the feel of a country home found in the South of France. Renovated in 2018, the villa incorporates high-end furnishing along with a brand new modern kitchen and extended pool and terrace. The villa has evolved into a contemporary home that will find guests wishing it was their very own. The elegant entrance with its traditional iron gate, coral stone-paved courtyard and stonewalls is the perfect showcase for this charming villa. The moment you approach the front door; the stunning panoramic views begin to unfold. With the advantage of a gentle hill setting, the view is a very intimate experience set away from the clamor of daily life. The green mountains, deep blue sea and sky, the sandy beach, Anguilla and tropical foliage flow like a painting. Step through the villa’s private beach gate and you have access to a very secluded sandy inlet. Built on multi-levels to take advantage of the setting, the design creates privacy from every angle. Beautiful native stonework flows through the structure and grounds. The improved terrace areas are dotted with spaces for seating and dining. The fully air-conditioned great room, open to the view and breeze, is fully refurbished in serene colours. Travertine floors run throughout. The fabulous new French kitchen is straight from a design book on Provence. Unique pieces like the antique French butcher’s table, charming accessories and stylish modern stove create the perfect atmosphere to prepare gourmet meals. Garden and sea view surround the kitchen while also overlooking the renovated and enlarged swimming pool. The three bedrooms, with en-suite bathrooms, are stylishly unique and exotic; each with a different design theme. All have sea views and two have been enlarged to include private seating areas with outdoor terraces. One bedroom is on the first level and only steps from the pool. The two upper-level bedrooms each open to the covered terrace but can also connect via a locked shared door via the master bathroom. A seclude outdoor reading area can be found at the end of the covered balcony.Although quite secluded you are a short walk to Baie Rouge Beach and just steps from the snorkeling site, Trou David, a famous landmark in St-Martin. You are ten minutes to Porto Cupecoy’s fabulous restaurants and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping. Only 10 minutes from the International SXM airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg.

listing.listing_description: Where the mountains meet downtown you’ll find Main Street Contempo. Though it’s set above the shops and restaurants of Park City’s charming Main Street, this stylish apartment is only a few minutes’ walk from the Park City Town ski lift. Invite up to eleven friends or family members to live like locals at this convenient five-bedroom vacation rental.Watch life unfold in town from a pair of chairs on the street-facing balcony—or see the stars come out during a honeymoon-worthy soak in the hot tub on the private rooftop deck, which also features a barbecue. After a day on the slopes, serve refreshments from the wet bar or wine cooler and settle in front of the gas fireplace and cable TV, all to the strains of the Sonos sound system.Pale wood floors, neutral tones and an open-plan layout give Main Street Contempo its modern flair, while a wall of windows in the great room brings the natural scenery outside into the space as well. A generous sectional and several chairs offer ample seating close to the fireplace and TV, and there’s room for eight around the dining table. A granite-topped breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances make the fully equipped kitchen a pleasure to look at—and to cook in.The five bedrooms at this luxury property all have en-suite bathrooms, making it perfect for groups who want privacy while on holiday. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed. Younger guests will want to claim the bunk bed and twin bed in the fifth bedroom as their own.Thanks to its downtown location, Main Street Contempo is only a 2-minute walk from the nearest ski lift, as well as local favorites like the Park Silly Sunday Market. By car, it’s 5 minutes or less to the base of both Park City Mountain Resort and Deer Valley resort, plus, for summer visitors, Park City Golf Course. Don’t miss the chance to visit the nearby Utah Olympic Park, where you can tour the facilities and try out a thrilling bobsled ride.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From Villa Abiente’s poolside sun-deck, you’ll enjoy spectacular views of Phuket’s Phang Nga Bay. Leading to the bay, and Cape Yuma’s Beach, you’ll find a walking trail through lush tropical greenery, which will have you on the beach in just five minutes. With three ocean-view bedrooms, Villa Abiente is perfect for a family vacation, couples retreat, or a golf trip with friends. Nearby, you’ll find theist golf on the island, Phuket’s downtown core, and plenty more.White and grey tones, floor-to-ceiling glass, and modern decor combine within Villa Abiente to create a tranquil, relaxing environment that contrasts delightfully with the vibrant blues and greens of Phuket. Fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight fill the open-concept villa, harmoniously blurring the line between inside and out with its wide openings. Features like rock gardens, murals, a floating staircase, and eclectic works of art make Abiente an exciting place to explore and relax.Inside, Abiente is equipped with high-end electronics, Wi-Fi, sound system, and television. The villa is air-conditioned, and there are several ceiling fans to circulate fresh tropical breeze. On the terrace, several furnished living and dining areas surround the infinity pool. And, there’s a barbecue, great for grilling up something fresh From a local market. And, complimentary with your reservation, you’ll have access to Cape Yuma’s villa manager, daily breakfast, chef services, housekeeping, and security.Within a thirty-minute drive, you’ll be able to access Laguna, Red Mountain, and Mission Hills, Phuket’s most prestigious golf courses. If you’re looking for some fun on the water or a fishing trip, Boat Lagoon and Royal Phuket marinas are both close by. Downtown, you’ll find fine dining, retail shops, and markets. And, for nightlife, head to Bangla Road, a stretch of closed-off street rich with neon signs, live music, and a great mix of bars, pubs, nightclubs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Old world charm meets modern style at this Italian luxury villa. Located in the historic Modica region of Southern Sicily, part of UNESCO’s Heritage Site’s, this private vacation rental resides among some of the most amazing landscapes and architecture the world has even known. Some of the many sites in Modica include, the Cathedral of San Giorgio, Church of San Pietro, and the Castle of the Counts of Modica. You will definitely want to bring a camera.Ancient building materials, stone and wood, are the ingredients of this villa’s original design. Formerly a barn complex, now a luxurious modern home, Casi O Cantu has taken the most time tested elements from the old world and added in state of the art building materials to create an updated homage to the regions rich architectural history. Stone walls and archways and exposed wood vaulted ceilings can be seen in most areas of the interior. They are complimented by wooden furniture, cozy seating, and an open concept design, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Through an amazing stone archway, you’ll find the immaculate kitchen. Stocked with top of the line stainless steel appliances, marble countertops, and a rustic sleek decor, you’ll feel like you’ve gone back in time, but you’ve brought a chef’s kitchen with you.Outside on the terrace, enjoy an afternoon dip in the refreshing salt water pool. For lunch, prepare a meal in the outdoor kitchen, or on the barbecue, and eat in the alfresco dining area. For dinner, head inside to the formal dining area and light a fire in the beautiful stone fireplace. Then turn on the sound system, and the tone is set for an elegant evening.After you’ve taken the time to explore Modica, direct your attention onwards to the amazing historic regions of Ragusa, Siracusa, and Mount Etna, all fellow members of UNESCO, they are a must-see if you’re a history aficionado. Or, if you’re feeling like a trip to the beach, there are several public beaches just a short drive from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This three-bedroom villa boasts contemporary decor, dramatic sea views and a stunning infinity pool looking out over the Pointe Milou hillside—it’s easily one of our must-see St. Barts vacation rentals. The island of St. Barts, with its perpetual sunshine, is a tropical paradise attracting the rich and famous from around the world.Enjoy the refreshing Caribbean trade winds while lounging on one of the villa’s cozy sun beds out on the sun deck—they’re next to the infinity-edge pool that appears to blend into the ocean beyond. Grill up a casual meal on the gas barbecue and dine alfresco on the outdoor table. With Wi-Fi access throughout the villa you and your guests can stay connected during your stay, and as an extra bonus, daily housekeeping (except for Sundays and holidays), is provided to keep the villa up to par.The interior of this chic two-level home offers sleek furnishings, vaulted ceilings and stylish decor pieces. The main living room and dining area open up to the terrace and pool deck and showing off the incredible sea and island views. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped for you to create a home-cooked meal with stainless steel appliances, and gadgets like a blender and espresso machine.The villa’s three bedrooms are divided between the two levels and can comfortably sleep up to six guests. The master, king-sized, bedroom is located on the upper level while the two other queen-sized bedrooms sit on the lower. All three rooms feature en-suite bathrooms with showers, air-conditioning, flatscreen televisions and ocean views.You will have easy access to the nearby Lorient beach as well as the Christopher Hotel’s spa services and restaurants. A 7.6 km drive brings you to the capital town, Gustavia, where you can explore the high-end boutiques and diverse restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This fabulous luxury townhouse is located within steps of Earl's Court in the Kensington neighborhood of London. The renovated Victorian home with redbrick facade blends antique elegance, exceptional modern comforts, and beautiful contemporary artwork. Spacious interior living areas, a gourmet kitchen, and an ample alfresco terrace form an ideal haven for private enjoyments between excursions on the city. Three comfortable bedrooms accommodate families, business travelers, or groups of friends up to six in size.The apartment's central, open-concept living area offers ample room for serene downtime or festive gatherings, with large windows infusing the space with plentiful natural daylight. Enjoy cozy evenings in the lounge by the fire, watching your favorite TV programs or sharing a bottle of wine. Prepare delicious meals in the sleek, fully equipped kitchen, and gather around the beautiful table for six. Smooth hardwood floors and uncluttered white surfaces conjure a natural tranquility, accentuating the gallery-worthy artwork and subtle touches of exquisite décor.A lovely conservatory is located off the master bedroom, with skylight windows illuminating a quiet sitting area. This room leads through French doors to the private back terrace, featuring an open-air lounge area and table—perfect for meals and spirits under the summer sky.The master suite features a king bed, desk, TV, and deluxe ensuite bathroom with shower and freestanding tub. Each of the two guestrooms has a queen bed. One has access to a hallway bathroom, while the other enjoys an ensuite bathroom with shower. Heating throughout the home keeps you comfortable in the winter months.The vintage townhouse is within easy walking distance of Earl's Court and a plethora of fine restaurants, classic pubs, boutique stores, and Peter Jones. Explore other London neighborhoods via the Earl's Court Tube station, or drive minutes to nearby attractions including Harrods, Kensington Palace, and the V&A Museum.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Incredible design meets gorgeous natural surroundings, including beach views, at Sunset House. Set in the beach town of Tamarindo, this stunning Costa Rica luxury home was designed by renowned San Diego architect Steve Adams, custom built by Flor de Pacifico/Jeff Hutton and decorated by Mu Design to blend traditional tropical style with contemporary chic. Five bedrooms and indoor-outdoor living spaces make this vacation house rental both practical and unforgettable for the whole family.During your stay, you’ll be looked after by a housekeeper, caretaker and property manager, so you’ll only have to worry about whether to stay at the villa or walk to the beach. The expansive terrace off the main living area has sun loungers with views of the beach and estuary; head down the steps to another terrace with a pool. While away the afternoon in the hammock or the massage table, then cook dinner on the barbecue and watch the Guanacaste sunset as you eat. Thanks to all-natural insecticide throughout the outdoor spaces, you’ll be able to stay out comfortably.The heart of Sunset House is an open-fronted, thatched-roof pavilion where the warm Pacific breezes wash over a generous built-in sectional, live-edge dining table that can seat ten, and a fully equipped kitchen with a filtered water system and a counter that opens to a bar on the terrace. Accents like woven dining chairs, mid-century-inspired lounge seats and squared-off sconces add modern edge to the natural look.Each of the five bedrooms at Sunset House has an en-suite bathroom. There are two master suites with king beds and ocean views, and two additional bedrooms with king beds, one of which has ocean views and an al-fresco shower and the other of which has a private terrace. The fifth bedroom, meant for kids, has two bunk beds and two roll-out beds in case extra accommodations are needed.From the villa, it’s a quick 5-minute walk down to the sweep of Tamarindo Beach and a 10-minute walk to downtown Tamarindo, where you’ll find restaurants and shops. The closest airport to Sunset House is Tamarindo Airport, a 4-mile drive away.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
