listing.listing_description: Turn your ski holiday to best advantage at the beautifully appointed, conveniently located Vickery's Vantage. This sleek five-bedroom Highlands home boasts a spacious open-concept layout with incredible mountain views, all in a setting only 10 minutes from downtown Breckenridge and a short drive from the gondola. Invite up to sixteen guests for a mountain getaway with friends or a relaxed break with extended family.In warmer weather, savor the views from expansive outdoor living areas with a barbecue, firepit and a honeymoon-worthy hot tub under the stars. If you've been out on the slopes, leave gear in the mud room, stretch out in the exercise room, test your skill at the pool table or unwind in the media room with refreshments from the wet bar. Other entertainment options include a Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.A mix of large open-plan spaces and quieter nooks makes it easy to gather as a group or steal a moment for a nap in this luxury home. The heart of Vickery's Vantage is a stunning great room with vaulted ceilings and panoramic views of the Colorado landscape, where you can cozy up to a wood-burning fireplace in the sitting area, turn out a gourmet meal in the fully equipped kitchen and seat twelve around the dining table.The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, two bedrooms with queen beds and shared access to a hall bathroom, and one bedroom with an extra-large twin bunk bed plus two twin-over-queen bunk beds-the perfect place for kids to giggle themselves to sleep. The bunk room also has shared access to a hall bathroom.With a location in the exclusive Highlands community, this vacation rental puts you about 10 minutes from the BreckConnect gondola and the shops and restaurants in downtown Breckenridge. For more choice in runs, make the short drive to the Breckenridge Ski Resort base or Copper Mountain Ski Resort; for an afternoon off from skiing, head to Carter Park and go sledding or tubing instead.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Near to beautiful Berawa Beach on the magnificent island of Bali’s southern coast is the four-bedroom Saraswati at Dea. Named after the Hindu goddess of knowledge and art, Villa Saraswati aspires to invoke guests’ curiosity to experience the natural beauty and ancient culture of Bali. The villa can host up to eight lucky guests, all of whom will have the good fortune of being able to experience one of Indonesia’s most famous islands while immersed in both comfort and supreme style.A team of professional chefs, housekeepers and butlers will be looking after nearly everything so that guests may enjoy themselves. Villa Saraswati offers guests a delightful pétanque court as well as a game of chess with giant fairytale pieces found in the garden. There’s an inviting swimming pool to cool down, and bicycles are also provided for light excursions. The interior of the home boasts a deluxe media room, the latest in surround sound systems, as well as access to Wi-Fi.The living pavilion is tremendous in size and has the amazing option of remaining walled in, or to have the walls removed and have seamless access to the swimming pool and terrace. This pavilion also hosts the suar-wood dining table that can seat fourteen, surrounded by additional lounge furniture of cushioned wicker sofas and traditional Balinese artworks. Make sure to check out the espresso machine and wine fridge in the stylish open concept modern kitchen.Saraswati at Dea has four plush en-suite bedrooms, each with dressing areas and access to private gardens. Guests can choose between king size or two twin size beds and can completely relax in their rooms with a television for entertainment. The en-suite bathrooms are alfresco, though walled gardens ensure complete privacy.The Berawa Beach district has more to offer than just some of the world’s most sought-after surfing locations, it is located near plenty of first-class resorts and restaurants, while being deeply immersed in local culture. Try out the nearby Nirwana Bali Golf Course or visit the Kuta Theater. For a taste of Balinese fine dining, Jalan Kartika Plaza will astound taste buds with rare spices that are hard pressed to be found anywhere else in the world!Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/get-the-look-balinese-bedroom-ideas/)Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Breathe the morning air amid panoramic vistas of the San Juan peaks at this modern residence in Telluride Town. Ideal for 2 couples or a family of 4, the condo residence features light-filled interior living areas, a gourmet kitchen, and inspiring views of the nearby slopes. Walk to the nightlife along Main Street and catch the gondola up to Mountain Village.The 1,200-square-foot home blends contemporary style, high-end comforts, and beautiful alpine accents. An open-concept living/dining room welcomes you back from the mountain, featuring a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, a table for 6, and a spacious TV lounge with gas fireplace. Generous windows infuse the interiors with natural light, and the wrap-around balcony enjoys expansive views. Fire up the barbeque for a well-deserved feast, or savor a glass of wine in the Rocky Mountain twilight.From Skyline at Meribel, you’re perfectly placed to enjoy the myriad delights of Telluride. It’s an easy walk to Main Street and Telluride Mountain Village Gondola, and a short drive to Telluride Golf Course. During the summer months, the city hosts an extraordinary array of world-class festivals celebrating film, jazz, bluegrass, cuisine, and much more--all within minutes of your door. Hiking and nature lovers will discover some of the most sublime landscapes in Colorado, including Bridal Veil, Ophir Pass, and Bear Creek Falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape the city whenever you please at this chic apartment above the bustling streets of central London. Plan out a day of sightseeing while you sip your morning tea in the furnished terrace lounge. Then, grab a quick bite and look out over the city-view before you head downstairs. Once you’re on the streets, walk the Marylebone neighborhood to discover boutique shops, cafes, and historic pubs.Just like the streets below, The Water Lily sparks curiosity with its trendy, artistic atmosphere. Take a moment to inspect the artifacts in the glass display case beside the living room’s piano. Have the entertainer in your group play a few numbers while you check out the view through the antique telescope. On a quiet night in, curl up in the media room for a movie. Or, find peace and tranquility in the yoga studio.Throw on some comfortable shoes and walk to nearby neighborhoods, Soho, Oxford Circus, and Mayfair, where you’ll effortlessly stumble upon unique shops, brilliant bakeries, and bustling local pubs. The big attractions, like Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, and Covent Garden, are all under 3-miles in a taxi. Before dinner, do some shopping in Picadilly Circus, and take a quick stroll through some of the free art museums in the area. Then, see what stirs your appetite at Camden Market.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its gorgeous beachfront location, charming colonial-style architecture and range of luxury amenities, Hacienda Corazon is a Riviera Maya vacation rental after your heart. Reserve its ten bedrooms for a getaway with up to twenty friends or extended family, or book with its two sister villas to host a family reunion, milestone celebration or destination wedding for up to 250 guests.Your holiday at Hacienda Corazon includes the services of a gourmet chef, villa manager, butler and housekeeper. After you’ve finished your welcome refreshments, get down to relaxing and playing with the help of the heated pool, al-fresco living and dining areas, outdoor sound system and barbecue. There’s also a games room inside, along with a choice of video games, a satellite television, a wine cooler and Wi-Fi.Inspired by traditional Mexican estates, the residence is laid out around a tranquil central courtyard. Follow the arched doorways into inviting living and dining areas with intricate tilework, vibrant fabrics and sleek furnishings. The hacienda has four bedrooms with king beds, three bedrooms with two queen beds each, and three bedrooms with two twin beds, which can be combined into king beds if desired. All ten bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have ocean views or open to a terrace.Set off from Hacienda Corazon in the provided kayaks or atop the paddleboards to explore the bay just in front of the house. From the villa’s location in the exclusive Puerto Aventuras community, it’s also a 15-minute drive or less to the golf and tennis club and downtown Playa del Carmen. For a memorable day trip, make the 30-minute drive to the Tulum ruins or the 45-minute drive to Tulum itself and find out why it’s becoming a trendy honeymoon destination.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is near a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Built to capture incredible ocean views, Villa Skyline is a modern paradise. Located in Turks and Caicos, on the western edge of Grace Bay, Villa Skyline is perfect for a family getaway, couples retreat, or even a romantic, island honeymoon with a little extra space. Nearby, you’ll find duty-free shopping, Casablanca Casino, exciting nightlife, and the beautiful beachfront of Grace Bay. Sleek and stylish, Villa Skyline is a trendsetting estate, outfitted with state of the art electronics, designer furniture, and a minimalistic approach to decor, focusing on quality over quantity. The second-floor living room is a spacious, open concept area that flows to the kitchen, dining area and beyond to the entrance foyer. All of these spaces feature wide openings to the terrace and balcony, allowing the fresh breeze, natural sunlight, and ocean views to provide refreshing atmosphere throughout the interior. The three levels of balcony make it easy to find solitude to work on your tan or host group gatherings and social events. All three bedrooms have incredible ocean views as well.Outside, you’ll love cooling off in Skyline’s refreshing swimming pool, lounging in the hot tub, and gazing upon the endless ocean view from a sunbed. Back inside, Skyline is equipped with air conditioning, Wi-Fi, cable television, and a sound system. There’s also a fitness room and office space if you need to keep up with any daily routines.Grace Bay Beach, just a few minutes from home, features calm waters with a clear, sandy bottom that is perfect for families and casual swimming. If you’re interested in diving or snorkeling, the barrier reef on the outskirts of the bay are buzzing with aquatic life, but only accessible by boat. If there’s a golfer in your party, Provo Golf Club has the island’s only course and consistently ranks among the Caribbean’s top ten.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The quintessential rock, sea and sky of the Greek islands appear in all their glory at Villa Etheras. This cliffside Santorini vacation rental was named for ether, believed by the ancient Greeks to be the mystical fifth element from which the world was created along with air, fire, earth and water—and, in their mythology, the pure air breathed by the gods. When you sample its panoramic views, gorgeous terrace and chic interiors, you may enjoy a spiritual experience, too.Set into the rock of the hillside, the villa’s private oceanfront terrace commands views over the caldera and along the coast. Gather around the shaded dining table, stretch out on a seat in the sun or cool off in the infinity pool, which features a lounging platform that appears to be floating on the water’s surface. Inside, a TV, sound system, DVD player, Wi-Fi and air conditioning round out the amenities at this luxury property.The white stucco walls so characteristic of the islands are carried into Villa Etheras, where they wind around an open-concept living room and kitchen. A sleek fireplace surround and polished marble coffee table contrast with the soft slipcovered sofa in the living room; in the fully equipped kitchen, a rock slab is a rugged counterpoint to the minimalist cabinets and breakfast bar.The villa’s two bedrooms are the perfect size for a small family or two couples on holiday together—or even for an indulgent honeymoon in the Santorini sun. Both bedrooms have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and sea views.With a location in the quiet village of Firostefani, Villa Etheras is a short drive from the larger town of Fira and scenic, unpretentious Exo Yalos beach. When it’s time to leave your island retreat, plan on a 7-mile drive from the villa to the ferry docks at Athinios Port Santorini.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Dahlia is a stunning contemporary waterfront villa on the island of Koh Samui. Situated near Choeng Mon on the island's northeastern shore, the villa is just fifty paces from the nearest beach and enjoys breathtaking, panoramic views of Thongson Bay and the Gulf of Thailand. The villa features extraordinary open-air living and dining areas along with exquisite interiors and top-end amenities. Three superb and ample bedrooms accommodate six guests, perfect for families, multiple couples, or small groups of friends.With a gorgeous infinite swimming pool, ample lounge areas, and the scintillating waves lapping the shore beneath you, the villa's balcony is ideal for savoring the South Pacific sun and breeze. A wall of sliding glass doors joins the balcony and interior living areas, creating a seamless space for relaxation and entertainment. Enjoy dreamy days luxuriating on elegant loungers, floating in the pool's sparkling waters, and sipping cool refreshments in the shaded lounge. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, cook a delicious meal in the fully equipped kitchen, and relish it around the lovely dining table. Sip sunset cocktails in the main lounge while gazing at the horizon, and watch your favorite shows on TV when night falls. Stunning original decorative objects, at once modern and traditional, evoke the timeless beauty of coastal Thailand with consummate style.Each of the bedroom suites echoes the main living area in layout and décor, with a glass wall opening from the room to a furnished terrace. There are two rooms with one king bed each and one room with a queen bed. Each suite includes an ensuite bathroom and is equipped with air conditioning, a safe, and a television. Each enjoys breathtaking ocean views.Villa Dahlia offers a perfect balance of seclusion and proximity to the many pleasures of Koh Samui. Walk literally steps to the beautiful beach beside you, or drive to any number of world-class beaches, including nearby Naturism Beach. There are some excellent restaurants near by and you're a short drive to the fabulous Six Senses Resort, with its extraordinary restaurant on the tip of the peninsula, Dining on the Rocks. Samui Airport is just about five kilometers away, making the villa an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spacious, stylish and close to almost everything, Paramount is tops for a Desert Cities holiday. Set behind the gates of an exclusive community in Indio, this chic five-bedroom vacation rental is a private retreat that’s just minutes from shopping, dining, golf and more. Reserve a stay with friends for the Coachella festival or tennis at Indian Wells, or with a group of extended family for a laid-back California getaway.Spend your stay relaxing or entertaining in the resort-worthy backyard, which features a swimming pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. Or head inside after sunset, pour a glass from the wine fridge and enjoy the media room, fireplace and Wi-Fi.Taking inspiration from the area’s rich tradition of mid-century modern style, the villa’s open-concept great room pops with color, from the tomato-red sectional in the sitting area to the matching stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. There’s also a breakfast nook in the kitchen, as well as a separate formal dining room that seats eight.There are four bedrooms in the main house at Paramount and one in a guest house. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with California king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, one bedroom with a bunk bed and twin bed, and one bedroom with a full bunk bed and twin bed. The two bunk rooms share a bathroom. And with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and terrace, the guest house gives couples the luxury of honeymoon-style privacy.The villa is 5 miles or less from several golf courses, shopping and dining at charming Old Town La Quinta, the Coachella festival grounds and Indian Wells Tennis Garden, and 10 miles or less from even more golf courses and Palm Desert.City ID # 20-00021226Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: No matter what season you visit Sun Valley, there’s always lots of fun and excitement to be had. From the ski slopes to the golf course, this private, five-bedroom vacation home is always ready for an adventure. And, with its central location, you’re never more than a few miles from Sun Valley’s main attractions. There’s plenty of space and sleeping accommodations for ten, making Skyline perfect for a family holiday, a ski or golf trip with friends, or an unforgettable corporate retreat.Spectacular Mountain views are framed by Skyline’s massive windows, following the contours of the vaulted ceiling, the interior is spacious and one with its natural surroundings. Exposed wood, intricate stonework, and leather couches set a rustic-chic tone throughout. The warmth created in Skyline is both cozy and elegant, perfect for a relaxing night in or a formal dinner party. In the kitchen, beautiful stained-wood cabinetry is punctuated by rich granite countertops. High-end stainless steel appliances will inspire your inner chef. And, the formal dining table is made of authentic raw-wood, with eight chairs to match.After dinner, head to the lounge, it’s a great spot for a relaxing night with family and friends. There’s a pool table, arcade games, bubble hockey, and an amazing view of the hillside. Cozy up on the plush leather couch and warm yourself by the wood burning fireplace. You could also get a fire going outside, roast some marshmallows, turn on the heat lamps, and enjoy a starry night from the furnished terrace.If it's golf or skiing you’re after, you’re in luck. Two beautifully scenic courses and two easily accessible chairlifts are located within three miles of Skyline. If you feel like exploring the city, visit downtown Ketchum and check out some of their boutique shops, local restaurants, and vibrant nightlife. You could also spend the night ice skating at the town rink or catch the latest movie at the Magic Lantern Cinema.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Recharge in the peace of the desert with this private and well-equipped Coachella Valley villa. The sun-reflecting pool is ringed by stone seats and shaded lounge areas, with the lofty mountains visible just beyond the villa’s tall palm trees. Relax at the mosaic-tiled villa bar or in the leafy gardens, before taking on local golf courses, wilderness hikes and the local bar and restaurant scene.Breathe in the balmy desert air from the shaded environs of the plush chairs and sofas of the Noman Estate’s shaded terrace, and plan a day to remember in this famous Californian valley. Guests will appreciate the inventive and colorful decor that runs throughout the vibrant living space, which is decked out in premium furniture, shining glass and polished wood. Air-conditioned bedrooms offer a solid night’s sleep, while the premium barbecue will fire up a delicious meal that can be enjoyed at the social bar outside, as the pool lights shine and stars peek out from the blue/red veil of the evening sky.Literally 2 minutes from the Coachella Valley Music and Arts site, guests at Nomad Estate can take in the desert landscapes and delightful picnic spots of the Thousand Palms Oasis Preserve. A dizzying selection of premium golf courses are within a 10 minutes drive, ranging from dynamic hillside courses to sweeping valley fairways. After a stimulating walk to a viewpoint in the nearby hills, hit downtown Indio for a delicious Western-style meal and tasty glass of locally-brewed beer or Californian wine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.City permit #20-00025920

listing.listing_description: Estate Belvedere is a boutique villa located in St. Croix, the largest of the US Virgin Islands. This property spans over three and a half acres and has six bedchambers for a total capacity of sixteen guests with ample room for an additional fifty guests for special events. The estate has recently been renovated in order to incorporate certain upgrades, though in such a way to keep alive large elements of the centuries old architecture and history.Stays at Estate Belvedere leave guests in a state of total serenity. The grounds feature immaculately manicured gardens that produce an indisputable utopian effect. Guests can whittle away the hours sunbathing on the terrace’s comfortable furnishings next to the large stone swimming pool. Modern amenities at Estate Belvedere include climate control, an entertainment center, Wi-Fi and a fully equipped exercise room.Originally the main building on Estate Belvedere was built as a sugar mill in 1791 and retains its old world charm regardless of the recent upgrades. The interior showcases elements of design that reflect the quiet sophistication from an era gone by and are complemented by a choice selection of elegant furnishings. A modern gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances makes cooking a pleasure with the little added bonus of a delightful herb garden.Estate Belvedere’s six bedrooms are sophisticated yet understated, adding to an already cozy atmosphere. All bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and climate control. Three of the six bedrooms are located in the main building, two of which possess a king size bed, and a third room has a queen. The three remaining bedrooms are found in the tower, with one room containing a queen bed and the two other rooms, two queen size beds, each with the added feature of direct terrace access.Nothing is too far on St. Croix for guests of Estate Belvedere – and there is plenty to see and do. Cane Bay Beach is a popular spot, where snorkeling and scuba diving are incredibly satisfying. An elite Country Club is located nearby for golf and tennis enthusiasts, as well as the island’s world-famous bioluminescent bays, which are a feast for the eyes and should perhaps be on everyone’s ‘bucket list.’ Enjoy a perfect Caribbean vacation with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a tropical vacation with hacienda flair at Villa Mariposa. Set on a hill outside Nosara and looking out to the forest and Pacific Ocean, this luxury Costa Rica vacation rental has beautiful views. Reserve the four-bedroom villa for a relaxed warm-weather holiday, or book it with the neighboring Casa Colibri to host a memorable family reunion or intimate destination wedding amid lush scenery.The villa is surrounded by a covered porch with sitting and dining areas perfect for reading, napping or just sitting with a cocktail in the balmy breeze. There’s an infinity pool that seems to stretch into the treetops and a private garden for your exclusive use. Listen to birdsong along with your breath at the yoga platform between Villa Mariposa and the neighboring casa, or inquire about using the shared soccer field and tennis courts.Traditional stucco walls and a tiled roof open to a gracious open-plan living area. Wrought-iron chandeliers and beamed ceilings have a bit of hacienda style, while streamlined banquette seating and wicker chairs are comfortable and modern. The spacious, fully equipped open kitchen pairs its own chandelier with rich-toned wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a convenient breakfast bar.Villa Mariposa has four air-conditioned bedrooms one with a king bed, and three with queens; two have ensuite bathrooms and two share a bathroom. A daybed in the master bedroom, and another in a main room/hall means the property can accommodate up to ten guests, if necessary. With floral bedding, high ceilings, and charming mullioned windows, the bedrooms are cozy and cheerful.A location just outside the town of Nosara puts Villa Mariposa within easy reach of beaches and restaurants where you can enjoy everything from a quick local snack to a honeymoon-worthy dinner. It’s a 10-minute drive into Nosara, a 15-minute drive to the nearest beach, Playa Pelada, a 20-minute drive to the famous surfing beach of Playa Guiones and a 35-minute drive to the turtle nesting sites on Playa Ostional. Plan to fly into the airports in San Juan, Liberia, or Nosara, or ask to land your helicopter right on the property’s shared soccer field.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
